title: Rory Feek Tearfully Accepts His First Grammy Award And Dedicates It To His Late Wife | St. Pierre | 93.1 WPOC
text:
Rory Feek Tearfully Accepts His First Grammy Award And Dedicates It To His Late Wife posted by @stpierreonair - share 
The 2017 Grammy Awards were an emotional event for many people. One of those people was Rory Feek of country duo Joey and Rory. 
Rory's partner and wife, Joey, passed away in 2016 from complications with cancer. Before she passed, the duo released "Hymns That Are Important To Us." That album earned them a Grammy nomination for best roots gospel album. 
Joey made Rory promise her that he'd attend the award ceremony if they were nominated. Incredibly, they even won. In his speech, Rory shared his story and tearfully dedicated the award to his late wife. Click Here for more from St. Pierre Boston, born and raised. Big sports fan, especially the Boston teams. Running enthusiast, on a mission to complete a half-marathon in all 50 states. Any extra free time spent watching live music and catching a movie with a giant bucket of popcorn. Keep in touch!
